video.title: How to Create Video Games with JavaScript
video.description:
Tips for creating games with JavaScript.

Talk given by Sean Hornsby at the JavaScriptLA meetup.

🐦 Sean on twitter: https://twitter.com/mushiwulf

🔗 Check out the JavaScriptLA channel for more great talks: https://www.youtube.com/c/javascriptla

Thanks to JavaScriptLA for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: mblakew
topLevelComment.text: Thanks for that EXTREMELY LOUD INTRO MUSIC

topLevelComment.author: Alec Thomas Quinn
topLevelComment.text: This is really great, thank you.

topLevelComment.author: Lubomir Herko
topLevelComment.text: This is actually one of the best intros to PhaserJS. Thanks for the presentation!

topLevelComment.author: Daniel Simionescu
topLevelComment.text: Cool to see JS in games :d
